title: Infallible
description: ***THIS STANDALONE LOVE TRIANGLE, IS BEST ENJOYED WHEN YOU DON'T READ ANY REVIEWS OR SPOILERS BEFOREHAND. GOING IN WITH AN OPEN MIND IS BEST.***(Book 3 features Rayden and better understood after reading Book 1)"Sometimes the wrong choices take us to the right places."My Past:I was eighteen when I first gave away my heart. A love so profound, I didn't understand it.My Present:I never had to prove she was mine until he makes an appearance. Tall, dark, and older.My Future:Should I walk away and not look back or stay and this time, let destiny guide my heart.Note: Triggers - Contains MM/MFM scenes. While each book is a standalone, the Serendipity series has a crossover of characters and might be enjoyable if read in order.
author: Charlene Namdhari
